decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A-00-01, EX-01-01, A-04-01 rev A, A-01-01 rev B, A-01-02 rev A, 1999 rev G received on 12/10/2019.
Attenuator schedule, LDR 50-25 Silencer specification by systemair, LDC-B 500-1200 Silencer Baffle specification by systemair, Topvex SF06 EL 13,7KW specification by systemair, MUB/T-S 042 450EC specification by systemair, Topvex FR08-R-CAV specification by systemair and C5778-57-00 rev C received on 07/02/2019.) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved materials, as specified in the application and so maintained at all times thereafter

Condition : 4 - a) The cumulative measured or calculated rating level of noise emitted from the mechanical services plant including heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) to which the application refers, shall be 10dB(A) below the existing background noise level, at all times that the mechanical system etc operates. The measured or calculated noise levels shall be determined at the boundary of the nearest ground floor noise sensitive premises or 1 meter from the facade of the nearest first floor (or higher) noise sensitive premises, and in accordance to the latest British Standard 4142; An alternative position for assessment /measurement may be used to allow ease of access, this must be shown on a map and noise propagation calculations detailed to show how the design criteria is achieved. 
b) The plant shall be isolated on adequate proprietary anti-vibration mounts to prevent the structural transmission of vibration and regenerated noise within adjacent or adjoining premises, and these shall be so maintained thereafter.   
c) Following installation of any mechanical services plant including heating, ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) to which the application refers, a post completion noise assessment which demonstrates the actual measured rating level of plant operating under normal conditions shall be submitted for approval to the local planning authority. All measurements shall be made in accordance with the methodology of BS4142: 2014 (Methods for rating and assessing industrial and commercial sound) and/or its subsequent amendments. The post completion report shall be both completed and submitted to the local authority within 28 days of completion of the installation for review.
Condition : 5 - The restaurant to which the proposed plant would be associated shall close at 23.00 Monday to Sundays, including Bank Holidays
description: Installation of new door, changing of frosted glass to clear glass and installation of louvres to external facade for restaurant fit out within Moxy Hotel.
